text: Donald Nathan Levine (June 16, 1931 â€“ April 4, 2015) was an American sociologist, educator, social theorist and writer. He was a central figure in Ethiopian Studies. Levine worked at the University of Chicago. He was born in New Castle, Pennsylvania. Levine died at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2015 deaths Category:University of Chicago faculty Category:American historians Category:Writers from Pennsylvania Category:Educators from Pennsylvania
